DOC.brief_summary: The investigators are collecting information on the calorie needs of patients in the first year postburn. The investigators hypothesize that increased energy needs continue for up to a year following wound closure from burn injury.
DOC.brief_title: Quantification and Derivation of Metabolic Needs in Children During Burn Rehabilitation
DOC.criteria: >25% burn surface area Wounds present as 95% healed Admitted to Shriners Hospital Cincinnati within 7 days of injury <5years old <25% burn injury admitted greater than 7 days postburn
